channel.title: Notes on Team Steam Stream
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Team Steam Stream

item.title: Android Reverse Engineering and Network analysis
item.description: Todays topic was reverse engineering of android applications and also some network traffic analysis.

item.title: Dynamic analysis
item.description: The theme of the day was dynamic analysis of programs, and some tools to use.

item.title: More memory corruption
item.description: We went through last weeks session for those who where not here, and then did some practical work on how memory corruption vulnerabilities are exploited.

item.title: Memory corruption vulnerabilities
item.description: The topic for this meeting was memory corruption vulnerabilities.
